Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: Placed on the top of the mountain, nice breeze and the view is beautiful.. best day to go is Sunday jazz brunch starting 11am to 4pm

Review Text: Yum-O!!!! This place has some delicious food. We all ordered the brunch. The bacon and Jimmy Dean sausage! Grits are awesome. The grits are AMAZING!!!! The waffle/pancakes we got were dry, but the owner was able to fix that for us. Super ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Great food great service. Owners had a lot of great information about the area.

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: Had a wonderful dinner here tonight. Ordered jerk chicken, coleslaw, southern corn and greens. All the food was delicious,  flavorful and serving size was a good. I was impressed with the service, excellent with communication and great ‚Ä¶

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: Great meals. From the meatloaf to the ribs. Authentic BBQ.  Service is excellent as the owners are on hand and get involved to make sure things get done right. Location is right in center of town so easy to get to.  The Iced Tea is also a nice treat.

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: This place has the best food hands down!

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: loved it!! have been here for a humanitarian trip and he helped us immensely! gave us tips being here in the DR. best authentic american food!! the fries were actually better than the ones i‚Äôve ever had in america! highly recommend.

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: I've lived in the country for a year, FIRST TIME i find a REAL BREAKFAST place! 100% recommend. the owner is super cool, the waitress is a sweetheart, & the food is YES! come come come!

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: I ordered the cat fish and it was the best I have ever eaten. The owners came and ask was everything good. The staff was friendly, it was more of a home town feeling. I will be back again.

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: Best Ribs in the world, No BS

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: Best BBQ I have ever had I am so happy I decided to come here and the service was wonderful. I will definitely tell my friends and you should too i absolutely recommend this restaurant

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: Had a great meal here! Would definitely come back again to enjoy the food & the view!

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: 5 Star Food, conversation, and service. Feel good food! Something completely different in DR! Mom and Pop place, with Mom and Pop food! Tell them Tiana sent you! You won't be disappointed!

Name: American Bar-bq
Review Text: Nices location for a BBQ with friends. Had a nice late lunch and sat in th park afterwards. The portions are filling so be ready. Very reasonable prices on the menu and the service was really nice and quick.
